nodes.text: A villa was owned by the retired mortician Commodex Tahn on the idyllic Mid Rim planet Naboo. The villa had a wide view of the water as well as several other buildings and waterfalls.

In 0 ABY, Doctor Aphra and her droid companions 0-0-0 and BT-1 assaulted the villa, breaking into Tahn's residence and torturing him for information regarding the late Monarch of Naboo, Padmé Amidala. The droids collected several valuables to frame their attack as a robbery before 0-0-0 electrocuted Tahn to death. They left as the villa burned behind them.
